title: 279 - Live From Mexico
description:
Do you get infatuated with your dreams and goals while forgetting that the process to get there is filled with ups and downs? As the guys bask in the beauty of Mexico with a live audience for Phenomenal Life 2021, they share that accepting the process to get your goals is the key to actually achieving them. Unfortunately, for many of us, the respect for the process isn't the same as the respect for the dream.  This episode is filled with transformational truths! Don't miss it!
 If you are interested in attending Phenomenal Life 2022 go to www.phenomenallife2022.com to register.
 Listener Perks 
  Get fresh pre-measured ingredients delivered to your door with Hello Fresh. Go to www.Hellofresh.com/12success and use the Promo Code “12SUCCESS” to get 10 FREE Meals and FREE shipping.

 Organifi is giving our listeners up to 20% off of their order! Just go to www.organifi.com/success. Their superfood green juice powder allows you to get your greens anytime, anywhere while on the go.
  Get connected with a network of over 3,500 people who listen to ET, and embody the work ethic and spirit of ET. To learn more about Breathe University. Subscribe to the podcast via  Apple Podcasts.

Do you get infatuated with your dreams and goals while forgetting that the process to get there is filled with ups and downs? As the guys bask in the beauty of Mexico with a live audience for Phenomenal Life 2021, they share that accepting the process to get your goals is the key to actually achieving them. Unfortunately, for many of us, the respect for the process isn't the same as the respect for the dream.  This episode is filled with transformational truths! Don't miss it!

If you are interested in attending Phenomenal Life 2022 go to www.phenomenallife2022.com to register.
